content: I do not have personal opinions or the ability to predict the future. however, it's always possible that the nhl may make further changes to the draft lottery rules in the future. the league may continue to tweak the odds to promote parity and prevent teams from tanking, or may make changes to better accommodate unforeseen circumstances, as they did during the covid-19 pandemic. ultimately, any changes to the draft lottery would likely be made with the goal of making the system fair and equitable for all teams.
